Address.label: Address
Address.value: 5900 PENN AVENUE, PITTSBURGH, Pennsylvania, 15206, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Duolingo Inc is a mobile learning platform to learn languages and the top-grossing app in the Education category on both Google Play and the Apple App Store. It has three predominant sources of revenue; time-based subscriptions, in-app advertising placement by third parties, and the Duolingo English Test.
